description: Dustin Poirier isn't exactly gunning for a win over Eddie Alvarez
title: Dustin Poirier explains the real reason he filed an appeal in his fight with Eddie Alvarez | FOX Sports

author: Dan Hanzus
description: Turns out there's a very good reason for Eddie Lacy to stay true to his fitness goals this offseason. Make that 55,000 reasons. The Seahawks running back met his first goal Monday.
title: Eddie Lacy meets first weight target with Seahawks

author: Thomas Bristow
description: Promoter Eddie Hearn revealed a fight between the world heavyweight champion and the Ukrainian could take place at the Principality Stadium in October
title: Anthony Joshua back in gym and "getting ready" for possible Klitschko rematch
